question:
The Part IV of the constitution of India has provisions for___:
  1. Uniform Civil Code
  2. Equal pay for equal work
  3. Equal right to means of livelihood
  4. Protection of wild-life
Select the correct option from the codes given below:
explanation:
1. Uniform Civil Code – Article 44
  2. Equal pay for equal work – Article 39(d)
  3. Equal right to means of livelihood – Article 39(a)
  4. Protection of wild-life – Article 48-A
